leadText.title: Digital Signature for the Procedures
leadText.description: Get a signature for the sole proprietor, the head of the organization or its employees

cards.title: Choose your CA
cards.text: *IMPORTANT! Since 2022, the issuance of a signature for managers is carried out by an authorized representative of the CA of the Federal Tax Service of the Russian Federation. For employees, a signature can be obtained at a commercial CA accredited by the Ministry of Telecom and Mass Communications.

cards.title: Issue the DS for the non-residents
cards.text: Unqualified certificate of electronic signature (UNDS) for work on the section of Tender sale of UVS (Hydrocarbon Crude) and Commercial procurement. How to get a UNDS – see the instructions.

cards.title: Issue the DS for the head of the company
cards.description: Legal entities, sole proprietors and notaries receive a certificate from the department of the Federal Tax Service or its trusted representatives

cards.title: Issue the DS for the employee
cards.description: Individuals and employees of companies receive a certificate from commercial certification centers

cards.title: Need advice on issuing a digital signature?
Renew the DS
cards.description: Check the validity period of your certificate and the place where the signature was issued. If your DS was issued in the existent CC, then the procedure will be performed in a simplified mode.

cards.title: Issue the DS for the non-residents
cards.description: Unqualified certificate of electronic signature (UNDS) for work on the section of Tender sale of UVS (Hydrocarbon Crude) and Commercial procurement. How to get a UNDS – see the instructions.

items.title: An electronic document signed by a qualified DS has the same legal force as a paper document signed by hand.
The documents are originals, they do not need to be printed. The Federal Tax Service and courts accept them as as originals
With EP you will be able to participate in procurements under 44-FZ and 223-FZ, and also in commercial auctions and bankruptcy tenders

textCard.title: Together with the DS, also available
text: - Rutoken is a physical data carrier for storing and using your DS
- Installation and configuration of the CryptoPro CSP Cryptographic Information Protection Facility (CIPF) and Qualified DS on your workplace
- License to use the information security control tool (CIPF) CryptoPro CSP as part of the key certificate.

head.text: No agency fees and even with a discount

items.text: ETP TEK-Torg concluded an agreement with the best on the market and trusted and accredited CCs. Thanks to this, you can find an electronic signature for any business tasks without agency margins and even with a discount.
